title: Race Condition in RPCDaemon dual mode? with more logs
body:
System information
Erigon version:
2021.08.1-alpha AND devel

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
CentOS 8
Commit hash :
dfa2800

Expected behaviour
trace_transaction and eth_call to return within a reasonable time

Actual behaviour
iotop reports full SATA saturation of SSD drive ~225MBps, never returns any results.

./build/bin/rpcdaemon --datadir=/ssd/erigon/all_data --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,shh --http.addr=0.0.0.0

./build/bin/erigon --datadir /ssd/erigon/all_data --maxpeers=10

continuation of: 
https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/2492


Logs from kill -6:
SIGABRT: abort
PC=0x44c7a7 m=0 sigcode=0

goroutine 0 [idle]:
